data.author: Austin Li

changelog.release_notes:
v1.3 - Changed "Invert Outline Color" detail to a "Choose color for Outline" color option. 
        - Fixed a bug where battery life was poor on the digital clock type. 
        - Fixed a bug where the app was calling for the battery percentage even when "Draw battery meter" detail was turned off.

v1.2 - Fixed a bug where battery meter was missing at 100%.
        - Smoothed out battery meter where before there were weird edges.
v1.1 - Updated digital clock font to something more stylish.
v1.0 - First release of mini watch watchface.

data.description:
Enjoy this highly customizable watchface with the new pebble-clay configuration settings page!

Choose from digital and analog clock types, and accurate, sunlight-corrected color options.

This watchface pairs especially well with any three stripe NATO strap you might choose to complement your pebble.

You can check out my source code on Github below. If you like the watchface, give me a heart <3!

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.3 - Changed "Invert Outline Color" detail to a "Choose color for Outline" color option. 
        - Fixed a bug where battery life was poor on the digital clock type. 
        - Fixed a bug where the app was calling for the battery percentage even when "Draw battery meter" detail was turned off.

data.title: Mini Watch
